alert.note: Alert for Christian; Macon; Moultrie; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Christian, northwestern Moultrie, northwestern Shelby and southeastern Macon Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Taylorville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stonington around 635 PM CDT. Assumption around 640 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Moweaqua, Macon, Dalton City, Bethany and Lovington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Illinois.
